metadata.Title: CVE-2016-3658 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - low
metadata.Description:
The TIFFWriteDirectoryTagLongLong8Array function in tif_dirwrite.c in thetiffset tool in LibTIFF 4.0.6 and earlier allows remote attackers to causea denial of service (out-of-bounds read) via vectors involving the mavariable.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2016-3658` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiff-tools - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiff5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
libtiffxx5 - 4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6
Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro

criterions.comment: tiff package in trusty/esm was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.0.3-7ubuntu0.6').
